title: JSON Functions - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
text: The JSON functions are used to decode and encode JSON-formatted strings. Note! The JSON parser is designed according to the specification RFC7159 and may accept non-JSON input, as stated in section 9 of RFC7159 . This chapter includes the following sections: JSON Decoding Functions JSON Encoding Functions
